Package sorcer.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CallbackModel
    The CallbackModel interface must be implemented by classes that do not use Model but want to callback.
    Mandator
    This interface defines the remote method client can execute on the remote object via a Mandate argument.
    Protocol
    The Protocol interface defines the basic operations for database connectivity.
    ProtocolStream

    Class Description
    Artifact
    This is a tool to make referring to sorcer jars a bit easier.

    This is an implementation of the crypt() algorithm of DES encryption.

    DataReader
    DataReader creates a lineBuffer (Vector) from a URL, file or string
    Deployment  
    Document
    Class that represents a document Object
    DocumentDescriptor  
    EmailCmd
    EmailCmd is a psedofactory for all email commands.
    GenericUtil
    SORCER generic utility class.
    GenericUtil.RedirectInputStreamRunnable
    Class starts a thread that redirects and input stream to file
    HostUtil
    Utility for getting host name and address.
    IOUtils  
    JavaSystemProperties
    Helper class for accessing system properties.
    LibraryPathHelper
    LibraryPathHelper implements a Set<String> synchronized with system property java.library.path. each change is immediately reflected in the Java runtime.
    Log
    Generic SORCER Logging Utility defines SORCER loggers for your providers.
    LoggingExceptionHandler
    Logs uncaught exceptions to SLF4J using a logger for a class that is on the bottom of exception's stack trace.
    Mandate  
    MavenUtil  
    NotifyTask
    Timer task that calls notify() on the monitor object
    ObjectCloner  
    ObjectLogger  
    ParentFirstProperties  
    Process2  
    PropertiesLoader  
    ProviderAccessor
    A utility class that provides access to SORCER services and some infrastructure services.
    ProviderLocator
    ProviderLoactor is a simple wrapper class over Jini's LookupDiscover.
    ProviderLookup
    A class which supports a simple Jini multicast lookup.
    ProviderNameUtil  
    Result  
    ServiceAccessor
    A service discovery and management utility allowing to access services by matching service templates and passing filters provided by clients.
    ServiceExerter  
    ServletProtocolStream  
    SMTPSession
    The SMTPSession class allows to send email messages using SmtpClient
